data.name: Sealer of Dungeons
data.detailed_description:
Do you like roguelites?
You grew up with the roguelikes, witnessed the rise of the roguelites and even the birth of the roguelite-lites? Great, then it is the perfect game for you! It has many inspirations from modern Roguelike games such as Binding of Isaac, Enter the Gungeon, Dead Cells, Spelunky, etc.

About the Sealer of Dungeons:
The sealer of Dungeons is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with heavy Rogue-like elements. Following Sealers on their journey, players will find great treasures that improve their items, give them powerful weapons and super abilities to stand against the mysterious creatures, discover secrets and seal the evil in the unknown dungeons. Gather precious loot, discover hidden secrets, and chat with merchants and shopkeepers to purchase powerful items to gain an edge.
Seal the dungeon, save the world!



Here's what Sealer of Dungeons is:
A procedurally generated adventure. Explore the new dungeon with every try.
It’s a rogue-lite game. Your sealer may die, but with each try, the dungeon changes, and new skill combines await.
Tons of unique abilities that make each playthrough special. All abilities can be combined!
More than 4 sealers to choose from! Each sealer has unique abilities that change the way you play the game.
Over 100+ different enemies and 20+ bosses to test your skills against. Hope you like challenging bosses and unique enemies!
Massive, expandable skill tree. Rack in the loot to upgrade your manor and give your successors a cutting edge.
Oh yeah, there's also a camp that you can upgrade which includes NPCs.
Equip your sealers with powerful weaponry and ability. Or get new friends like the phoenix, hell hounds, and wisp.
Tons of secrets and easter eggs to uncover... or are there? Yes, there are.
Got a controller? Play with a controller. Big Picture ready.
Enjoy



Key Features:
  • 150+ skills, all can be combined!
  • 20+ weapons
  • Upgradeable camp
  • Integrated controller support for popular control pads!
  • 4+ Playable characters
  • 100+ Enemy variants
  • 20+ Bosses
  • Secret Areas
  • Upgradeable shops
  • Dynamic lighting, visual effects, and art direction
  • Great soundtrack and sound design
  • Different endings for each sealer
  • The ultimate roguelike
  • A bunch of achievements
  • Hidden places, secret bosses, and much more...

data.short_description: Sealer of Dungeons is an action-shooter with Rogue-lite elements. Play Sealers on their journey, you will find great treasures and abilities to seal the unknown evil above. Gather precious loot, discover hidden secrets, and chat with merchants to get powerful items. Seal the dungeon, save the world!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ༼つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ༼つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
